dec.message: Play the game you want to play, regardless of age restriction

about.message:
✨This extension can crack the anti-addiction of some game platforms and help you realize game freedom✨

⚠️Indulging in games is not conducive to physical and mental health. Please arrange the game time reasonably and play appropriately⚠️

~~Happiness is not divided into age~~

msg0.message: Indulging in games is not conducive to physical and mental health. Please arrange the game time reasonably and play appropriately.

msg1.message: ___错误太多, 请单击右键 > 检查 > 控制台(console), 然后查看更多错误信息

msg2.message: ✨ Anti-Addiction Terminator supports forced login 7k7k account, which can be logged in in the extended menu

msg3.message: ___操作失败, 请检查您是否正在访问受支持的游戏网站, 或刷新网页, 然后再试一次

msg5.message: ___请在浏览器设置中配置快捷键
